entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 9:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: NNW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:48 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Near blizzard developing in the morning. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:48 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the evening then a few clouds. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:48 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
